extendedInfo.description: If you're tired of having to do "team captains" every time you want to change up teams, but don't want entirely random teams either, give this app a try.This team picker's skills are designed for basketball games.  Team player distribution is based on 7 different player skills and allows selecting which players are there before picking teams.Skills used: height, speed, handling, shooting, defense, teamplay, endurance.The algorithms used are quick and efficient, and produced fairly balanced teams based on the skill ratings.  It takes only a few seconds to add a player to the database, and only a few seconds more to un-select players not present.Some advanced options are available in the Preferences, as well as turning on a more detailed explanation of the team balances after the algorithm is done selecting players.* Supports 7 different player skills with ratings of 1 to 5.* Add, edit, and delete players.* Pick any number teams.* Select players available for current game.* Force certain players to be paired with or separated (split) from others.* Mark players as inactive to make selecting available players quicker.* Backup, restore, send (e-mail, Dropbox, etc.), and receive/load player database.* Import and export CSV versions of the database.* Easy and lightweight interface.* Can try to make teams' gender distribution equal.* Optional skill weighting.
